ComicInfo.Summary:
Marlo Chandler is all right, so her brothers, the police and Captain America leave her apartment.
Hulk is sent by the Pantheon to investigate a monster on Loch Ness. Instead of finding Nessie, Hulk finds Piecemeal, a monster who escaped from the lab of the Red Skull in the Amazon green forest. Piecemeal has powers similar to those of the Absorbing Man. While Hulk is battling Piecemeal, he gets badly hit from behind by the Mad man.
Plus: Ulysses.
ComicInfo.Tags: Elsa Chandler,Scotland,Hulk,Pantheon,Mad Man,Piecemeal,Reno,Ulysses,Ray Chandler,Rick Jones,Nevada,Detroit,Achilles,Doc Samson,Betty Ross,Perseus,Loch Ness,Keith Chandler,Elaine Schoenfeld,Marlo Chandler-Jones
ComicInfo.Title: More Or Ness; September 30, 1955
